thread.section_title: Citadines Place d'Italie Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Strategic location
thread.title_full: Strategic location - Review of Citadines Place d'Italie Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mdnorsalleh
title: Strategic location
text: Located strategically close to bus & metro. A shopping mall conveniently next door and plenty of cafes & halal restaurants nearby. A laundromat is also close by (less than 10 minutes walking). Each room has it's own kitchenette so if you're too lazy to go out to eat you can always cook yourself a simple meal. Rooms look clean with free wifi. Helpful staff too!
